verbose_text: Detoxification and drug metabolism One mechanism of MDR is that cancer cells up-regulate some DNA repair proteins, such as TOP1MT, UNG, and MTPOLB, to repair drug induced damage, TOP1MT is a mitochondrial protein involved in mitochondrial DNA replication, and RNAi knockdown experiment demonstrated its involvement in doxorubicin resistance in NCI_ADR / RES cells.
evidence: MDR is that cancer cells up-regulate some DNA repair
